83f2b92b18eb10f3849b6a3be99a7b55b886cae0.commitMessage: Issue #1566: ReturnCount violation fixed for SimplifyBooleanReturnCheck

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

a298a50d48358e58be31eaea6b9f0e263f5f046e.commitMessage: correction to handle SEMI after LITERAL_RETURN

e6571e6f5703fdd89bc6cbeddcce767e58ddbf50.commitMessage: removed paranoia checks to increase code coverage

84eddc36730c1eca845257201c71a0d1fb2d40cf.commitMessage:
Added a new class TokenTypes that contains all the type constants. This class
breaks the circular dependencies - the cost is needing to maintain this class
when a new grammar is introduced.
